concept.name: ont::religion-val
concept.relation: wn::|heavenly%3:00:00::| wn::|infernal%3:00:00::| wn::|nonsectarian%3:00:00::| wn::|unsectarian%3:00:00::| wn::|sectarian%3:00:00::| wn::|monotheistic%3:00:00::| wn::|religious%3:00:01::|

concept.name: ont::referential-sem
concept.comment: "The root type for all things that can be referred to: abstract meaning for THIS and IT"

concept.name: ont::relation
concept.comment: "All types that denote relations. This is the root of terms under abstract objects that take the ONT::F specifier"

concept.name: ont::domain-property
concept.comment: "these are modifiers that characterize an object/event with respect to a scale/domain (in ONT::DOMAIN)"

concept.name: ont::associated-with-val
concept.comment: "adjectives that classify the noun that it is pertaining to"

concept.name: ont::abstract-object
concept.comment: "abstract objects, mental constructions, with no physical realization"

concept.name: ont::religion-specific-val
concept.comment: "identity specifically based on religious affiliation, dogma, or theology (properties referring to the culture of the practicing people or nations belong to ont::culture-specific)"
